mapper.select: select ef.id as id, ef.fecha_hora as fecha_hora , ef.contenido as contenido, cm.id as cm_id, cm.fecha_hora as cm_fecha_hora, cm.contenido as cm_contenido, autor.nombre as ef_nombre, autor.email as ef_email, autorcom.nombre as cm_ucm_nombre, autorcom.email as cm_ucm_email from ENTRADAS_FOROS as ef INNER JOIN COMENTARIOS as cm ON ef.`id` = cm.`ENTRADAS_FOROS_id` INNER JOIN USUARIOS as autor ON autor.email=ef.USUARIOS_email INNER JOIN USUARIOS as autorcom ON autorcom.email=cm.USUARIOS_email

select ef.id as id, ef.fecha_hora as fecha_hora , ef.contenido as contenido, cm.id as cm_id, cm.fecha_hora as cm_fecha_hora, cm.contenido as cm_contenido, autor.nombre as ef_nombre, autor.email as ef_email, autorcom.nombre as cm_ucm_nombre, autorcom.email as cm_ucm_email from ENTRADAS_FOROS as ef INNER JOIN COMENTARIOS as cm ON ef.`id` = cm.`ENTRADAS_FOROS_id` INNER JOIN USUARIOS as autor ON autor.email=ef.USUARIOS_email INNER JOIN USUARIOS as autorcom ON autorcom.email=cm.USUARIOS_email where ef.id=#{id}
